sense.gloss: cutwater (of a ship), forefoot, drip (on a building), flashing, throating, starling (of a bridge)
stone skipping, skipping rocks, ducks and drakes
cutting a flower stem under water (to prolong its life)

sdata.j: ↑豆腐↑↓とうふ↓は↑軽↑↓かる↓く↑重↑↓おも↓しをして、２０↑分↑↓ふん↓ほどおいて↑水切↑↓|みずき↓り|する。
sdata.e: Lightly weigh the tofu down, leave it for about 20 minutes then drain.

sdata.j: トムは↑池↑↓いけ↓で↑水切↑↓|みずき↓り|をしてた。
sdata.e: Tom was skipping rocks on the pond.
